message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This would represent a fair deal for both of us.
